Hopefully I shall be able to check my email and the forums a few times while I'm away so you might not have to wait until the 22nd for a response if you're lucky, but you may have to wait a few days at least.

Sorry for any inconvenience this may cause. If you have any questions of a technical nature then please send them to the forums and other users may be able to help you out before I can.
